views.label: Projects
views.prompt: Run /wicked-crew:status to get all crew projects. Display each project as a card showing: project name, current phase with a phase progress indicator (clarify → design → build → test → review), status, complexity score, and when it was last updated.

views.label: Active Project
views.prompt: Run /wicked-crew:status to find the most recently active project. Show detailed view with: current phase, phase deliverables checklist, evidence summary, specialist recommendations, and signal analysis.

views.label: Evidence
views.prompt: Run /wicked-crew:evidence to show all evidence artifacts for the current project. Display as a timeline with: phase, artifact name, type, and preview content.

actions.label: New Project
actions.prompt: Ask the user to describe their project, then use /wicked-crew:start to create it.

actions.label: Execute Phase
actions.prompt: Use /wicked-crew:execute to run the current phase of the active project.

actions.label: Approve Phase
actions.prompt: Use /wicked-crew:approve to approve the current phase and advance.
